entry.title: Atosa MGF8454 76" Commercial 4 Drawer Refrigerated Chef Base
entry.summary:
Vendor: Atosa Refrigeration
Type: Chef Bases
Price: 3483.00

Atosa MGF8454 76" Commercial 4 Drawer Refrigerated Chef Base.

  • Compressor HP: 1/4HP
  • Capacity: 15 Cu. Ft.
  • Stainless steel exterior and interior.
  • 33F to 38F Degree Temperature Range
  • Built in Electronic Thermometer
  • Each Drawer Holds 12 1/6th pans
  • Over sized, factory balanced refrigeration system using a heavy duty Embraco Compressor.
  • Heavy duty stainless steel drawer slides and rollers; no tools required for drawer removal.
  • Magnetic drawer gasket is removable for easy cleaning and maintenance.
  • Recessed door handles.
  • Pre-installed heavy duty casters with brakes, are included for added mobility.
  • Cabinet top is one piece, heavy duty reinforced stainless steel to support countertop equipment.
  • Gravity fed self closing drawers.
  • Dimensions: 76"L x 32"D x 26-1/2"H
  • 2YEAR(S) ALL PARTS AND LABOR/5YEAR(S) COMPRESSOR WARRANTY

    •

entry.title: Everest ECB48D2 48-3/8" One Section Two Drawer Side Mount Refrigerated Chef Base
entry.summary:
Vendor: Everest
Type: Chef Bases
Price: 3421.00

Everest ECB48D2 48-3/8" One Section Two Drawer Side Mount Refrigerated Chef Base

  • Digital control and monitoring system that maintains optimum temperature by quickly reacting to temperature changes (33°F to 54°F)
  • Heavy duty stainless steel interior and exterior, with galvanized steel finished bottom and back wall of exterior
  • High quality 15 gauge stainless steel worktop
  • 12 gauge sheet metal caster brackets to support heavy weight on worktop
  • Air chamber, vent system and high heat insulation tech-mat layer to withstand up to 500°F eliminating heat exchange inside cabinet
  • Durable stainless steel corner guards
  • Stainless steel top grips for easy and safe maneuverability of unit
  • 2.5" thick high density foamed-in-place polyurethane insulation
  • Removable side panel and slide-out condensing unit for convenient repair and maintenance
  • Removable condenser air filter for easy cleaning
  • Forced-air cooling with dual evaporator fan motors providing balanced airflow throughout cabinet to ensure faster temperature drop
  • Energy efficient condensate drain pan assembly heated by high side copper tube
  • Heavy duty stainless steel drawer frames with low friction bearing slides
  • 5" overall height casters, front locking, standard for easy mobility
  • Two additional front adjustable legs
  • 3 Year Parts and Labor Warranty / 5 Year Compressor Warranty:
  • Dimensions: 48-3/8"L X 32-1/8"D X 20"H

entry.title: Turbo Air TCBE-72SDR-N 72" Four Drawers Refrigerated Chef Base
entry.summary:
Vendor: Turbo Air
Type: Chef Bases
Price: 5646.22

Turbo Air TCBE-72SDR-N 72" Four Drawers Refrigerated Chef Base

  • Self-Cleaning Condenser: The accumulation of dust in the condenser can cause the failure or breakdown of refrigerators. Refrigerators run normally until they reach a certain level of accumulation. At some point, when they are over the limit, their performance drops quickly resulting in damage to, or disposal of the stored products inside. The Self-Cleaning Condenser device keeps the condenser clean and prevents system failure by automatically brushing daily
  • Hydrocarbon refrigerants (R-209): With innovative and eco-friendly technology, Turbo Air brings you hydrocarbon refrigerators designed to meet the new standards of the EPA and DOE in 2017. Hydrocarbon refrigerants do not deplete the ozone layer and have very low contribution to global warming (ODP-0, GWP-3)
  • Strong body and durable construction: Built with heavy duty 16 ga. stainless steel, Chef Base top is manufactured of one-piece reinforced stainless steel to ensure durability.
  • Digital temperature display on front panel
  • Top is insulated to eliminate heat transfer to the interior of cabinet
  • Flat Top Countertops: TCBE-72/82SDR-(E)-N supports up to 1,192 pounds of equipment.
  • Durable stainless steel drawers
  • Side mount compressor unit: With compressors positioned on the side of the unit, our refrigerators can now be serviced without being moved. Our innovative, front breathing feature also allows this model to be highly efficient in narrow spaces.
  • High-density polyurethane insulation: The entire cabinet structure and solid doors are foamed-in-place using high density, CFC free polyurethane insulation.
  • Refrigerator holds 33°F ~ 38°F for the best in food preservation
  • Each drawer accommodates up to: 4” deep sixth (1/6) size pans (drawer pans not included)
  • Warranty: 3 Year Parts and Labor & 5 Years on Compressor
Specification
Model
TCBE-72SDR-N
Width 72"
Depth 32"
Height 20-1/2'' (Not Including 6" Casters)
Capacity (Cu.Ft) 9.22
# of  Drawers 4
Countertop Weight Capacity  1192 Lbs
Compressor Location Side Mounted
Compressor 1/4 HP
Temperature Range  33°F ~ 38°F

entry.title: Everest ECB82-86D4 86" Four Drawer Chef Base
entry.summary:
Vendor: Everest
Type: Chef Bases
Price: 4949.00

FEATURES

Everest, founded on a principle of continual improvement, is committed to bringing the best of the commercial refrigeration industry to its customers around the world through innovative products designed with reliability, durability and serviceability in mind.

Everest was established in Carson, California, in 2002 as a commercial foodservice equipment manufacturer. Everest's product lines have expanded to cover the demands of the global commercial foodservice equipment industry by adding new models every year. All of Everest's products for worldwide distribution are manufactured in our South Korea factory. The factory was founded in 1984 as a HVAC products and HVAC safety components manufacturer. For more than two decades, our factory has grown its manufacturing capabilities and know-how by adding new products, ranging from HVAC components, walk-in panels and commercial refrigerators. Our factories feature the most technologically advanced and automated assembly lines in the industry.

  •  Digital control and monitoring system that maintains optimum temperature by quickly reacting to temperature changes (33 F to 55 F)
  • Heavy duty stainless steel interior and exterior, and galvanized steel finished bottom and back wall of exterior
  • High quality 15 gauge stainless steel worktop
  • 12 gauge sheet metal caster brackets to support heavy weight on worktop
  • Air chamber, vent system and high heat insulation tech-mat layer to withstand up to 500??F eliminating heat exchange inside cabinet
  • Durable stainless steel corner guards
  • Stainless steel top grips for easy and safe maneuverability of unit
  • 2.5"ick high density foamed-in-place polyurethane insulation
  • Removable side panel and slide-out condensing unit for convenient repair and maintenance
  • Removable condenser air filter for easy cleaning
  • Forced-air cooling with dual evaporator fan motors providing balanced airflow throughout cabinet to ensure faster temperature drop
  • Energy efficient condensate drain pan assembly heated by high side copper tube
  • Heavy duty stainless steel drawer frames with low friction bearing slides
  • Six 5" overall height casters, front locking, standard for easy mobility
  • Three additional front adjustable legs
  • Warranty: 3 Year Parts & Labor | 5 Year Compressor
Specification
Model ECB82-86D4
Width 86-1/4''
Depth 32''
Height 20'' (Not including 5" Casters)
Capacity (Cu.Ft)  - cu/ft
# of Drawers 4
# of Pans 1*10
Compressor Location Side Mounted
Compressor 1/3 HP
Temperature Range 33 - 55 F

For more than two decades, our factory has grown its manufacturing capabilities and know-how by adding new products, ranging from HVAC components, walk-in panels and commercial refrigerators. Our factories feature the most technologically advanced and automated assembly lines in the industry.

  •  Digital control and monitoring system that maintains optimum temperature by quickly reacting to temperature changes (33 F to 55 F)
  • Heavy duty stainless steel interior and exterior, and galvanized steel finished bottom and back wall of exterior
  • High quality 15 gauge stainless steel worktop
  • 12 gauge sheet metal caster brackets to support heavy weight on worktop
  • Air chamber, vent system and high heat insulation tech-mat layer to withstand up to 500??F eliminating heat exchange inside cabinet
  • Durable stainless steel corner guards
  • Stainless steel top grips for easy and safe maneuverability of unit
  • 2.5"ick high density foamed-in-place polyurethane insulation
  • Removable side panel and slide-out condensing unit for convenient repair and maintenance
  • Removable condenser air filter for easy cleaning
  • Forced-air cooling with dual evaporator fan motors providing balanced airflow throughout cabinet to ensure faster temperature drop
  • Energy efficient condensate drain pan assembly heated by high side copper tube
  • Heavy duty stainless steel drawer frames with low friction bearing slides
  • 5" overall height casters, front locking, standard for easy mobility
  • Warranty: 3 Year Parts & Labor | 5 Year Compressor
